basic.description:
An advanced treatment of the written and spoken language, involving a study of syntax and style, written composition, translation into Spanish and oral discussions of cultural topics.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: Español avanzado

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of C in SPAN204.
One way exclusion    May not be taken with or after SPAN201; SPAN301; SPAN302; SPAN303; SPAN304; SPAN401; SPAN402.
